segmentosSRT.text: I've run up a pile of debts lately.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text:
- I heard you got back this morning.
- I'm back.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: I have come to see if you need anything.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: He has served in the Liberation Army?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text:
You were with Chunsheng.
Why isn't he back?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: Come along and get an education.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: The government wanted part of the house.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: He refused, beat up a cadre...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: and then set fire to the place.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: Of course. You're you, he's him.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: To deliver water to the steelworks.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text:
We're racing towards Communism,
and you worry about food?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: We are setting up communal kitchens.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: We are less politically aware than your son.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text:
We are just two bullets short
of liberating Taiwan.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text:
All I've seen at the worksites
are student marching bands.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: We'll spur them on with puppet shows.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: Sure we are. We'll definitely liberate Taiwan.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: We're off to report the good news.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text:
Fugui, Jiazhen,
you've made a real contribution.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: One to land on Chiang Kai-shek's bed...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: and the last in the toilet!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: The District Chief is upset, too.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: How can I ever make it up?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text:
- You're eating?
- Come on in, Mr. Niu.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text:
- Don't let me interrupt.
- We're finished.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: You have to get rid of those puppets.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: Let's not bring up the past.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text:
Burn them, okay?
I've got other people to see.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: Chunsheng has asked me many times...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: to get you a better job. What do you think?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: I may have found a prospect for Fengxia.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: Let's not let her in on it for now.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text:
Comrade Wan works
at the East Wind Factory.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text:
His father and grandfather
were workers, too.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: Fengxia's father took part in the revolution.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: Today comrades, Wan Erxi and Xu Fengxia...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: In good times, we think of Chairman Mao.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: First, pay respects to Chairman Mao.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: Another working class member on the way!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: So we've got to get going.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text:
- But you won't stay?
- No, thanks.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: Never mind. Let's go. Don't worry.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: I'm no longer head of the township.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: I have to confess my crimes.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: I have faith in the Party.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11

segmentosSRT.text: I've always followed Chairman Mao's path.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_11
